title: Kya Huaa Tera Vaada
overview: Kya Huaa Tera Vaada is an Indian soap opera that premiered on January 30, 2012 and went off air in May 23, 2013, on Sony Entertainment Television India. It also airs on Sony Entertainment Television Asia. The show stars Mona Singh and Pawan Shankar as the protagonists and Mauli Ganguly as the antagonist. Kya Huaa Tera Vaada is produced by Balaji Telefilms.
